alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 1:37AM MDT until June 19 at 2:15AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: The National Weather Service in Glasgow has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Daniels County in northeastern Montana... Northeastern Valley County in northeastern Montana... * Until 215 AM MDT. * At 136 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles south of Opheim, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Opheim, Richland, Port Of Opheim, Baylor and Glentana. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
